assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This project was approved by the Research Ethics Committee of the Institute of Integral Medicine Professor Fernando Figueira (CEP-IMIP) in Recife, Pernambuco and all individuals provided written consent for multi-gene testing (protocol number 29567220.4.1001.0071).
